actions.text: Amendment SA 1493 proposed by Senator Reid to Amendment SA 1199. (consideration: CR S7304; text: CR S7304) To require employers seeking to hire aliens to certify that they have not, and do not intend to, provide a notice of a mass layoff.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1493 proposed by Senator Reid to Amendment SA 1199.

amends_amendment.purpose: To increase the number of green cards for parents of United States citizens, to extend the duration of the new parent visitor visa, and to make penalties imposed on individuals who overstay such visas applicable only to such individuals.

purpose: To require employers seeking to hire aliens to certify that they have not, and do not intend to, provide a notice of a mass layoff.
